name: Void-Dogs
description:
Made for GBJAM 5!

Void Dogs are an elite unit of space jumpers. As their last remaining member you are tasked with saving humanity from the clone scourge. Leap into the depths and save us all!

As a Void Dog you must dive through space, defeat ghastly clones and avoid 'roids to make it through each stage. Points are awarded for each successful asteroid you avoid and for flying in close proximity to the 'roids. A bonus multiplier is added if you can splat a clone into a 'roid.

Survive each stage on your journey to save humanity - Fight for a high score to beat your friends.

Best of luck!

Controls

Z - Shoot left.
X - Shoot right.
Cursor keys - Move.

A game by Charles Palmer (@meheleventyone).

Music licensed under Creative Commons CC BY-SA 3.0 from Akira.
